document_data.name: Protection From Charm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from charm''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[wu jen]] in [[Kara-Tur]] to defend against certain enchantments. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell protected a wu jen from ''[[charm]]''-based magic.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a piece of a very charming creature.
